    MSc CS @ETH Zurich | IIT Bombay (Rank 1, Gold Medalist) | ML Engineer

    About Me

    I'm a Computer Science MSc student at ETH Zurich with a strong background in machine learning and software engineering. As the gold medalist from IIT Bombay, I bring technical excellence and innovative problem-solving to every project.

    With professional experience at organizations like the World Bank and Budweiser, I've developed both technical expertise and business acumen that allows me to create impactful solutions.
